attributes.action: stop forcing business to use welsh in store
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More than 80% of people cannot speak welsh and I am one of that large majority.  It drives me crazy when I go into a supermarket like tesco or a bank like HSBC and I see signs in large letters in welsh.  If you are going to promote minority languages it would be more sensible to have french, spanish, german or an arabic language like urdu
